raw_body:
PATHINATHER – DR GREGORY CAMILLUS – (Former Patron of Sydney Branch of St. Benedict’s College,​ Colombo Old Boys’ Association),​ born on 12th March 1931 and passed away peacefully on 12th March 2024 in Sydney,​ NSW,​ Australia. Precious youngest son of the late Athanasius and Catherine Pathinather,​ son-in-law of the late Cyril and Gertrude Edirimanasinghe,​ beloved husband of Merlyn (nee Edirimanasinghe),​ devoted father of Devika (Good Shepherd Convent,​ Colombo 13),​ Roshan and Yohan (both of St. Benedict’s College,​ Colombo 13),​ father-in-law of Padmi and Ruwanie,​ cherished Grandpa of Rachel,​ Maegan,​ Stephanie,​ Jade,​ Aaron and Shonella,​ beloved brother of late Christopher,​ Margaret and Ignatius,​ brother-in-law of late Michael,​ Noel,​ Premraj,​ Rani and Stanislaus. Funeral Service will be held on Saturday 23rd March 2024 at Our Lady Queen of Peace Catholic Church,​ Greystanes NSW,​ Australia,​ followed by burial at Castlebrook Memorial Park,​ Rouse Hill,​ NSW. email : g​p​a​t​h​i​n​a​t​h​e​r​@​g​m​a​i​l​.​c​o​m​ ; y​o​h​a​n​p​a​t​h​@​g​m​a​i​l​.​c​o​m​
019749
